name: Meril Lip Balm Lemon
description:
Keep your smiles dazzling and your lips protected with the vitamin E enriched Meril Chap Stick. It leaves no waxy feel on your lips so they feel naturally fresh and lively. Sun protected lips for beautiful smile. PROTECT YOUR LIPS EVERYDAY.
Keep your smiles dazzling and your lips protected with the vitamin E enriched Meril Chap Stick. It leaves no waxy feel on your lips so they feel naturally fresh and lively. Sun protected lips for beautiful smile. PROTECT YOUR LIPS EVERYDAY.

name: Meril Lipgel
description:
Manufacturer: square toiletries ltd.  Meril Lip Gel provides the ultimate relief to dry lips. Aloe Vera in the gel provides a therapeutic effect and helps to relieve skin dryness. It is available with citrus flavor and provides nourishment to the lips while it protects the very delicate lips skin. Meril Lip Gel promises to bring back everyone's smile in the winter.  Ingredients  Mineral Oil, White Petroleum Jelly, Aloe vera Gel, Food Grade Citrus Flavour.

name: Cute Lipgel
description:
Cute lip gel with natural lipocerit is the ideal daily lip care. Cute Lip Gel contains valuable, natural skin lipids that make dry and chapped lips smooth, soft, and beautiful again, protecting against harmful environmental influences. Cute Lip Gel is easy to apply, gets absorbed quickly, and keeps your lips non-greasy.INGREDIENTS•          Petroleum jelly•          Liquid Paraffin•          Vitamin -E- acetate•          Sarbik acid•          Allantoin•          Perfume
Cute lip gel with natural lipocerit is the ideal daily lip care. Cute Lip Gel contains valuable, natural skin lipids that make dry and chapped lips smooth, soft, and beautiful again, protecting against harmful environmental influences. Cute Lip Gel is easy to apply, gets absorbed quickly, and keeps your lips non-greasy.
INGREDIENTS
•          Petroleum jelly
•          Liquid Paraffin
•          Vitamin -E- acetate
•          Sarbik acid
•          Allantoin
•          Perfume

name: Vaseline Lip Therapy Original
description:
Manufacturer: Unilever Ltd.•Vaseline® Lip Therapy™ Lip Balm Tins help to lock in moisture for beautiful, healthy lips  •Vaseline® Lip Therapy™ tins give lips a natural, glossy shine  •Made from pure Vaseline® Jelly to provide long-lasting moisturization and lip care  •Clinically proven to help heal and prevent dry lips by locking in moisture  •Non-sticky, non-greasy formula, suitable for regular use.
Manufacturer: Unilever Ltd.•Vaseline® Lip Therapy™ Lip Balm Tins help to lock in moisture for beautiful, healthy lips  •Vaseline® Lip Therapy™ tins give lips a natural, glossy shine  •Made from pure Vaseline® Jelly to provide long-lasting moisturization and lip care  •Clinically proven to help heal and prevent dry lips by locking in moisture  •Non-sticky, non-greasy formula, suitable for regular use.

name: Vaseline Lip Therapy Aloe Vera
description:
Clinically proven to help heal dry lips. • Vaseline® Lip Therapy® Aloe Tin is clinically proven to help heal dry lips •  Instantly softens and soothers dry lips • Locks in moisture so lips feel better over time • Relieves dry, dull and cracked lips, while locking in moisture to help them heal  • Fresh aloe scent delights your senses  • Locks in moisture to help lips recover discomfort  Ingredients: Petrolatum, Linalool, Aloe barbadensis leaf extract, Citronellol, Eugenol, Limonene, Isopropyl myristate, Aroma.

name: Glow & Lovely Face Cream Blemish Balm
description:
Glow & Lovely (formerly Fair & Lovely) BB Cream for all skin types, with Multivitamins and a hint of Foundation for a makeup like Glow. Feel more confident in your own skin with the new Glow & Lovely (formerly Fair & Lovely) BB Cream. This cream blends in perfectly to give you a Makeup like Glow every day. It is enriched with multivitamins that work from deep within to nourish your skin, foundation blends in and covers dark spots and blemishes to give you an even skin tone. Use it daily to hide dark spots and blemishes and achieve a bright, even-toned look every day. SPF 15 keeps your glow protected in the sun, and matte texture leaves your face feeling non-oily and fresh throughout the day. The Glow & Lovely BB Cream is easy to apply and gives instant results: Just dot the cream across your cleansed face and neck and spread evenly using your fingertips to get a make-up finish in seconds! Glow & Lovely BB Cream makes you look perfect instantly. So now you have the answer to get the perfect make-up finish for any occasion, be it your first day of college to first interview, an office party, or any festive occasion. Now, Makeup like Glow is super easy only with the Glow & Lovely BB Cream!
